DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the recovery profiles after general anesthesia in patient undergoing anterior cervical spine surgery. This study will compare the Riker sedation agitation scores between two groups, with or without dexmedetomidine as an anesthetic adjuvant.
DOC.brief_title: Recovery Profiles After c Spine Surgery: With or Without Dexmedetomidine as an Anesthetic Adjuvant
DOC.criteria: ASA 13 elective case for ACDF surgery plan for extubation after surgery SBP>140 mmHg CAD HR<50 BPM, heart block motor weakness > grade 4 BMI >30 allergic to dexmedetomidine, fentanyl
